title: UOIT Fall Open House
description: Come experience what UOIT is all about! Meet current students, faculty and staff; attend faculty information sessions; visit labs and experience why more students are making UOIT their first choice. To register visit http://sites.uoit.ca/openhouse/

title: Offers of Admission Start Releasing
description: Offers of admission will begin to be released once appropriate documentation is submitted. Offers will continue to be issued on a regular basis as documentation is received.

title: Deadline to Submit Applications to OUAC for Competitive Programs
description: Deadline to submit completed applications for competitive programs to the Ontario Universities’ Application Centre (OUAC). Competitive programs include: Kinesiology Diploma to Degree, Medical Laboratory Science, Nursing and Nursing (post-RPN)

title: Document Submission Deadline for Competitive Programs
description: A midterm or final mark must be submitted for each prerequisite course in order to be considered for admission. Competitive programs include: Kinesiology Diploma to Degree, Medical Laboratory Science, Nursing and Nursing (post-RPN)

title: UOIT Pathways Information Night
description: If you’re considering a college-to-university transfer program, we invite you to come meet current students, staff and faculty and learn more about our academic programs and student services. for info and to register visit http://sites.uoit.ca/pathways/event-calendar.php

title: Deadline to Apply for Chancellor's, President's and Founder's Scholarships
description: Deadline for Secondary School Students to apply for the following: Chancellor's Scholarship, President's Scholarship and Founder's Scholarship

title: UOIT Winter Open House
description: Meet current students, faculty and staff; attend faculty information sessions; visit labs and experience why more students are making UOIT their first choice. to apply visit http://sites.uoit.ca/openhouse/

title: Deadline to submit applications to OUAC for equal consideration
description: Deadline to submit completed applications to the Ontario Universities' Application Centre (OUAC) for equal consideration. Please note: Applications received after this date will still be processed by OUAC and distributed to the universities. However, specific institutional deadlines will apply.

title: Document Submission Deadline for Non-Competitive Programs
description: Document submission deadline for admissions consideration for non-competitive programs.

title: Deadline to submit FIRST Robotics Canada Scholarship Application
description: Deadline for out-of-province secondary school students and Ontario secondary school graduates to submit FIRST Robotics Canada Scholarship application.

title: Deadline for Global Leadership Award Application
description: Deadline for international secondary school students to submit Global Leadership Award application.

title: Deadline to Apply for UOIT Residence
description: Residence applications must be received by this date to guarantee a spot in residence. Apply at http://uoitrez.ca/

title: Deadline to submit tuition deposit
description: Applicants must first accept their offers through OUAC before they can pay their deposits.
